mapper.select: SELECT G.*, S.subject_name, E.exam_type FROM goal_score G inner join subject S on G.subject_id = S.subject_id inner join exam_type E on G.exam_type_id = E.exam_type_id WHERE G.member_no = #{memberNo} AND G.exam_type_id = #{examTypeId}
SELECT exam_type_id AS examTypeId, member_grade AS memberGrade, exam_type AS examType FROM exam_type WHERE member_grade = #{memberGrade} ORDER BY exam_type
